reviewText: While I really enjoyed season one, I found season two to be very disappointing, with a dramatic drop in the quality of the scripts, and a sometimes drastic change in the behaviour of the characters compared to season one. Season two varies from clumsy to just plain stupid and awful.If you can get it cheap, it's worth it just for season one.
summary: Season one is great, season two, not so much
Title: Shameless - Seasons 1 & 2 - Original UK Series

reviewerName: Brian Edwards "Brian S. Edwards MD, Lipidologist"
reviewText: I am sure this English version is as good as the American version.  However the 50% of the dialect is impossible to understand.
Title: Shameless - Seasons 1 & 2 - Original UK Series

reviewText: I am now addicted to this series. It is funny, It is also a bit raunchy and has some violence so not a great series for little ones at all. However, it does show the funny side of community in UK quite clearly. I bought more to send to family for Xmas. Watching for good pricing on the next Region 1 seasons to come to Amazon.
Title: Shameless - Seasons 1 & 2 - Original UK Series

reviewText: This Brit version is a total bust in my view. I love d the Macy version, made in USA. I could not keep my eyes open, the language i difficult to keep up with at times, camera work is LOUSY. I usually love the British comedies, but this is rank!
Title: Shameless - Seasons 1 & 2 - Original UK Series

reviewText: Awesome show! I loved watching it when I lived in London. The family is out of control but they will help you if you ever need them. This show is in no way, shape, or form for the sensitive viewer
Title: Shameless - Seasons 1 & 2 - Original UK Series
